abstract: The new iPhone 4 will be available June 24 and is priced at $199 for the 16-gigabyte version and $299 for the 32-gigabyte version.
snippet: The new iPhone 4 will be available June 24 and is priced at $199 for the 16-gigabyte version and $299 for the 32-gigabyte version.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Seeking to fend off intensifying competition from Google and others in the smartphone business, Apple introduced a new version of the iPhone on Monday that includes a front-facing camera for video chats.

headline.print_headline: New iPhone 4 Adds a Camera for Video Chats

byline.original: By Miguel Helft and Jenna Wortham
